doc.title: Porogaramu
doc.description: Iki gice kivuga ku buryo bwo gukora porogarama .

example1.title: {{0}}Urugero rwa kode ya paji y'intango
example1.annotation1: Menya neza nimba ari izina ry'ibanze ry'ibanze, subiramwo {{0}} ntusubire gukora.
example1.annotation2: Menya neza nimba ari {{0}} canke urubuga rwayo rutangura n'ikimenyetso @ Niba ari uko biri, subiramwo {{1}}.
example1.annotation3: Raba nimba ari urupapuro rwa videwo Inzira yayo itangura na /watch Niba ari uko biri, {{0}} izogaruka.
example1.annotation4: Raba nimba ari urupapuro rwa videwo rugufi Inzira yarwo itangura na /shorts/ Niba ari uko biri, {{0}} izogaruka.
example1.annotation5: Menya neza nimba ari urupapuro rwo gushiramwo.
